actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to equalize the retirement pay of members of the uniformed services of equal rank and years of service, and for other purposes.
short_title: Uniformed Services Retirement Pay Equalization Act

summary.text: Uniformed Services Retirement Pay Equalization Act - Provides that the retired pay of each retired officer of the Navy or the Marine Corps shall be computed on the basis of rates or pay provided by law at the time of his retirement or subsequently for officers on the active list. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 6149)

titles.title: Uniformed Services Retirement Pay Equalization Act
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to equalize the retirement pay of members of the uniformed services of equal rank and years of service, and for other purposes.
